subject: Football
lead_paragraph: This season, the Miami Dolphins are going glam, with a new owner intent on turning them into the N.F.L.’s version of the Los Angeles Lakers, boldface-named fans and all.
snippet: This season, the Miami Dolphins are going glam, with a new owner intent on turning them into the N.F.L.’s version of the Los Angeles Lakers, boldface-named fans and all.
